elements.name: Create a new social networking comment

steps.name: I create a new comment with the following details "2004", "Sheyi Abdul", "sheyi@Abdul.com" and "Just commenting on this recent post of your holiday"

arguments.val: "Just commenting on this recent post of your holiday"

steps.name: I should get response of "2004", "Sheyi Abdul", "sheyi@Abdul.com" and "Just commenting on this recent post of your holiday" returned with status code of 201

arguments.val: "Just commenting on this recent post of your holiday"

name: SocialNetworking
description:
As a User
  I want to be able to use the service - https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/
  so that I can make posts
